00008 import javax.swing.AbstractListModel;
00009 import ScheatorDb.*;
00010 import javax.swing.ComboBoxModel;
00011 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00012 import java.util.Iterator;
00013 import java.awt.ItemSelectable;
00014 import java.awt.event.ItemEvent;
00015 import java.awt.event.ItemListener;
00016 
00025 public abstract class ScheatorComboBoxModel extends AbstractListModel implements ComboBoxModel, ItemSelectable {
00026     DbObject provider;
00027     LinkedHashMap<Integer, DbObject.Data> list;
00028     DbObject.Data selection = null;
00029 
00039     public Object getElementAt(int index) {
00040         DbObject.Data retval = null;
00041         int i = 0;
00042         for(Iterator it=list.values().iterator(); it.hasNext();) {
00043             if (i == index) {
00044                 retval = (DbObject.Data) it.next();
00045                 break;
00046             }
00047             i++;
00048         }
00049         return retval;
00050     }
00051 
00056     public int getSize() {
00057         return list.size();
00058     }
00059 
00064     public void setSelectedItem(Object anItem) {
00065         selection =  (DbObject.Data) anItem;
00066 
00067     }
00068 
00073     public Object getSelectedItem() {
00074         return selection;
00075     }
00076 
00077     /* ItemSelectable */
00078 
00079     //protected EventListenerList listenerList = new EventListenerList();
00080 
00081     public Object[] getSelectedObjects() {
00082         return new String[] { "a", "b", "c" };
00083     }
00084     
00085     public void addItemListener(ItemListener l) {
00086         listenerList.add(ItemListener.class, l);
00087     }
00088 
00089     public void removeItemListener(ItemListener l) {
00090         listenerList.remove(ItemListener.class, l);
00091     }
00092     
00093     void fireItemEvent(Object item, boolean sel) {
00094         ItemEvent evt = new ItemEvent(this, ItemEvent.ITEM_STATE_CHANGED, item,
00095         sel ? ItemEvent.SELECTED : ItemEvent.DESELECTED);
00096 
00097         Object[] listeners = listenerList.getListenerList();
00098 
00099         for (int i = 0; i < listeners.length - 2; i += 2) {
00100             if (listeners[i] == ItemListener.class) {
00101                 ((ItemListener) listeners[i + 1]).itemStateChanged(evt);
00102             }
00103         }
00104     }
00105 }
